parameters: Long ago, the gods were almost wiped out by an ancient
evil...all but a handful survived near extinction. Their
deaths were part of one manâ€™s crusade...
A man who through his pursuit for power found a way to
slay a god and absorb their power eventually becoming a
being more powerful than a god.
But all that power consumed him and he went mad, he
nearly destroyed half the universe before the remaining
gods sealed him away. That was nearly five hundred
Since then new gods have come and gone, the art of
slaying gods now known by all mortals...although
forbidden now. Though the Dark God had been sealed away
he had many followers who worshiped him.
His cult created monsters that have since plagued the
world, to overcome this ever evolving threat the Knights
of Astradizel were formed and the world was once again
Today, their legend is widely known and to join their
ranks is to protect the world from danger and serve the
Twin Goddesses. Your story, however...is a different one
The role you are to play depends greatly on who you choose
to be, will you be a traveler suffering from memory loss who
was saved by a Merchant and his wife? Or maybe the heir to
the throne of the Netherfal Kingdom?
Maybe your destiny is to become one of the Legendary Knights
Of Astradizel? By choosing a Daemora, your path will be that
of the Heir to the throne of Demons.
However, if you choose one of the other races you will start
as a traveler who was caught up in an attack and wake up
with memory loss, over time you will regain these memories...
However, you will also have the oppertunity to join the
ranks of the Knights who protect this world or even become
a Cultist. So, choose your character wisely...
Humans, weak but strongly honor bound, the humans are
the most powerless of them all, though they flourish
in battle due to their ingenuity, cunning and their

The Demidura , these are the Beast Race of the world.
These mortals have the anatomy of a human and the
features and traits of both a human and an animal.
They are a very powerful race yet have always been
looked down upon and shunned. During the reign of Demon
Lord Vymirin they were used as both pets and servants
and forced onto the battlefield as cannon fodder.
Even to this day they are despised and outcasted by
the humans and kept around by the demons as servants...
or in some cases as pets. Choose this race?

The Dwarnyr, the small folk. These strong and rather
well built beings are small and short but very, very,
very physically strong. They are known for forging the
finest weapons and armor you could ever desire.
They usually make their home in the cave systems of
mountainous areas, they are the finest craftsmen you
will ever come across and the best miners around.

The Daemora, or Demon Race are beings created to serve
the Night Goddess, They were originally created as a
scourge on the Mortal Races and placed on Astradizel for
the sole purpose of Novexa's Amusement...
However, she soon took a liking to her children and
grew attached and thus  declared that one of them would
rule over the entire race as their leader and assert
dominance over the Mortal Races her sister had created.
Daemora are humanoid and for the most part
indistinguishable from the humans but more akin to an
Elf with long pointy ears, horns, retractable wings,
Their eyes are usually a bright shiny red. Choose this
This race is not ready to play, however the start maps have

Ghillasians, while these people are essentially humans
with fish like features. They have gills on both sides
of their necks and fins on both sides of their face...
There are also fins on the side of their arms and legs as
well as a fin on their backs. Their fingers and toes are
webbed allowing them to swim through the water with ease.
In simple terms, they are the Mer-Folk of Astradizel.
This race is not ready to play, however the start maps have
yet to be made. Please select a different race.
